# Psychology Services Tender Announcement
## Overview
The Correctional Services Canada (CSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Psychology Services for the Barrie Area Parole Offices. The services will be delivered on a periad of 01-October-2023 to 30-September-2024, with the option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

## Statement of Work (SOW)
The successful supplier will provide psychology services for up to 325 hours per year to support the CSC's mental health initiatives for offenders. The services will include:
- Essential and non-essential mental health and/or psychological assessment or psychological risk assessment services,
- Treatment and counselling services,
- providing services in accordance with federal and provincial legislation, standards, and guidelines,
- consulting with CSC personnel to ensure services are consistent with the relevant legislation, practice standards, and policies.

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:
- Technical proposal (40%),
- Past performance (20%),
- Price (40%).
